page.title: 01GENERAL INFORMATION
page.content:
FIVE SIXTHS OF THIS AREA IS AGRICULTURAL LAND.ONE SIXTH IS RESIDENTIAL. MAIN CROPS ARE WHEAT, BARLEY, SUGAR BEET, OIL SEED RAPE, POTATOES AND PEAS. THERE ARE A NUMBER OF PIGGERIES AND BATTERY HOUSES. BILLINGHAY AND WALCOTT AND THE ROAD BETWEEN ARE THE ONLY RELATIVELY HIGH PLACES STANDING ABOVE THE FEN LAND. MANY DRAINS MAKE AGRICULTURE POSSIBLE. BILLINGHAY IS ALSO THE BASE OF A LARGE ROAD HAULAGE COMPANY AND A GRAIN MERCHANT. THERE IS ALSO A REMOVAL COMPANY WHICH, AMONG ITS CLIENTS, SERVES A LOT OF RAF PERSONNEL MOVING IN AND OUT OF THE AREA.
GEN. INFORMATION
